metadata.title: Netlify Documentation Knowledge Base
metadata.description: Comprehensive Netlify platform documentation organized by categories

overview.title: Netlify Platform Overview
overview.description: Netlify is a web platform for building highly performant, secure, and reliable websites and web apps. This documentation covers all major areas: Development & Functions, Framework Integration, Build & Configuration, Data & Storage, Forms & User Input, Domain & HTTPS Management, Team & Account Management, and Billing & Usage.

development_functions.title: Development & Functions
development_functions.description: Tools and services for developing and deploying functions on Netlify

docs.title: Netlify CLI: Manage Functions
docs.description: Create, test, and serve Netlify functions locally using the Netlify CLI. Invoke functions, debug, and deploy with ease.

docs.title: Netlify Edge Functions Overview
docs.description: Fast, personalized web experiences using TypeScript/JavaScript at the edge with Netlify; modify requests, localize content, serve ads, authenticate users, and more.

docs.title: Netlify Edge Functions API
docs.description: Netlify Edge Functions API reference guide: request handling, response types, context object, supported Web APIs, and more.

docs.title: Netlify Edge Functions: Get Started
docs.description: Learn to create, test, deploy, invoke, and monitor Netlify Edge Functions.

docs.title: Netlify Dev: Local Development
docs.description: Develop and share Netlify sites locally; use Netlify Dev for local development environments, including custom configurations and HTTPS.

docs.title: VS Code Netlify CLI Debugging
docs.description: Configure VS Code to debug Netlify CLI functions and development server.

docs.title: Netlify CLI: Get Started
docs.description: Use Netlify's command-line interface for local development, builds, and deployment.

docs.title: Netlify API Quickstart
docs.description: Netlify API basics, deployment, common endpoints, and authentication using OAuth2.

docs.title: Netlify Async Workloads
docs.description: Develop Async Workload functions with Netlify; includes installation, function writing, event handling, retries, error handling, and type safety.

framework_integration.title: Framework Integration
framework_integration.description: Deploy and optimize popular frameworks on Netlify

docs.title: Next.js Advanced API Routes
docs.description: Advanced API routes for Next.js on Netlify Runtime v4, including background and scheduled API routes.

docs.title: Next.js Adapter v5
docs.description: Netlify's Next.js adapter v5 configures Netlify sites for optimal performance, including caching, on-demand revalidation, and image optimization.

docs.title: Angular on Netlify
docs.description: Deploy and optimize Angular apps on Netlify; leverage Netlify Image CDN, serverless functions, and more.

docs.title: Deploy Express on Netlify
docs.description: Deploy Express apps on Netlify using Netlify Functions; integrate with frontend or standalone.

docs.title: Astro on Netlify
docs.description: Deploy high-performance Astro sites on Netlify; leverage features like partial hydration, Netlify Image CDN, and server-side rendering.

docs.title: Gatsby on Netlify
docs.description: Gatsby and Netlify integration: features, adapters, build processes, and performance optimization. Covers Gatsby versions, Netlify plugins, and configuration.

docs.title: Hugo framework on Netlify
docs.description: Fast static site generator; build speed, themes, Netlify integration, and version control.

docs.title: Eleventy Static Site Generator on Netlify
docs.description: Flexible, JavaScript-based SSG; Netlify integration, Edge Functions, build configurations.

build_configuration.title: Build & Configuration
build_configuration.description: Configure builds, environment variables, and deployment settings

docs.title: Netlify Build Configuration
docs.description: Configure Netlify's build settings, including build commands, publish directories, and more.

docs.title: Netlify File-Based Configuration
docs.description: Configure Netlify builds, deploys, and settings using the netlify.toml file; learn best practices.

docs.title: Netlify Build Environment Variables
docs.description: Configure Netlify environment variables for builds; access and use them in your build process.

docs.title: Netlify Build Software
docs.description: Netlify build's available software, including languages (Node.js, Python, Ruby, etc.) and tools (npm, yarn, hugo etc.), versions, and configuration.

docs.title: Netlify Build Plugins
docs.description: Extend Netlify build functionality with plugins; install, create, share, and manage plugins for enhanced build processes.

docs.title: Netlify Dependency Management
docs.description: Manage dependencies for Netlify builds, specifying Node.js, Go, PHP, Python, Ruby, Rust, and Swift versions and dependencies.

docs.title: Netlify Monorepo Builds
docs.description: Configure Netlify builds for monorepo projects; automated and manual configuration options; base, package, build, and publish directory settings; commit status control.

data_storage.title: Data & Storage
data_storage.description: Store and manage data using Netlify Blobs and Connect

docs.title: Netlify Blobs Overview
docs.description: Netlify Blobs: Store and retrieve blobs and unstructured data; use as a key/value store or database; offers CRUD operations via functions, edge functions, build plugins, and CLI.

docs.title: Netlify Connect Overview
docs.description: Unify content sources, access data through GraphQL API, improve web architecture, and boost performance with Netlify Connect.

docs.title: Netlify Connect Data Access
docs.description: Access and query Netlify Connect data using GraphQL APIs, sandboxes, and clients; includes schema review, query optimization, and caching details.

forms_user_input.title: Forms & User Input
forms_user_input.description: Handle form submissions and user input with Netlify Forms

docs.title: Netlify Form Setup
docs.description: Enable Netlify Forms, configure HTML or JavaScript forms, handle submissions, and set up notifications.

docs.title: Netlify Forms Notifications
docs.description: Configure email notifications for form submissions using Netlify Forms.

docs.title: Netlify Form Spam Filters
docs.description: Prevent spam submissions with Akismet, honeypot fields, and reCAPTCHA; manage spam and verified submissions.

domain_https.title: Domain & HTTPS Management
domain_https.description: Configure custom domains, DNS, and SSL certificates

docs.title: Netlify Custom Domains
docs.description: Configure custom domains for Netlify sites, including production, previews, and branches.

docs.title: Netlify HTTPS Setup Guide
docs.description: Configure Netlify for HTTPS, using automatic certificates or your own custom certificates.

docs.title: External DNS Configuration
docs.description: Configure external DNS to point your domain to Netlify; instructions for apex and subdomains.

edge-functions: Eleventy Static Site Generator on Netlify
